news.title: Trump renews call for interest rate cut, says rates would be lower if Fed chief Powell 'understood what he was doing'
news.summary: President Donald Trump said once again that Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell should lower interest rates. Trump said Powell should cut interest rates to keep inflation in check.

news.title: Trump administration announces fees on Chinese ships docking at U.S. ports
news.summary: The Trump administration on Thursday announced fees on Chinese-built vessels. The fees are expected to be in the region of $1,000 per vessel.

news.title: Meet Partiful, the Gen Z party-planning staple that's taking on Apple
news.summary: Partiful is a popular app for event planning among Gen Z users. Despite launching during the pandemic, Partiful survived to become a popular event planning app. It's now also competing against Apple.

news.title: Read Hertz CEO's letter to employees about Bill Ackman's 'significant' stake in the rental car firm
news.summary: Hertz CEO Gil West says he is "encouraged" and "energized" by Bill Ackman. Ackman is taking a "significant" position in the rental car company.

news.title: Elliott Management takes a stake in Hewlett Packard Enterprise. How the firm may create value
news.summary: Activist Elliott Management could help spur a great opportunity for shareholders. The firm has a stake in Hewlett Packard Enterprise. The company has been through a difficult time in recent years.

news.title: Golfers think the sport keeps them healthy. New research says it will even help them live longer.
news.summary: The sport has a growing number of senior participants. There's new research that says playing the game is a longevity booster. The game has been around for more than 100 years.

news.title: I’m 15 years older than my second wife and have $1 million in savings. She promised to pass my estate onto my sons after I’m gone. Do I trust her?
news.summary: “My wife is probably one of the most honest persons I’ve ever known,” he says. “I don’t know what I would do without her.” “She’s a very, very good person,’ he adds.

news.title: 99% of the ‘biggest winning stocks’ share this criteria, says investing legend Mark Minervini
news.summary: Two-time U.S. Investing champ says the ‘Magnificent Seven’ won’t outperform forever. He shares his criteria to find the new tech leaders.

news.title: My husband will inherit $180K. I think we should invest the money. He wants to pay off his $168K mortgage. Who’s right?
news.summary: “He has $15,000 in investments and $5,500 per month in disability income,” his lawyer says. “He’s got a lot of money to spend.”

news.title: I begged my adviser to sell amid the market turmoil. He dragged his feet and I lost $20,000. Do I have any recourse?
news.summary: “If he had moved my money out of the market weeks ago, much of my loss could have been prevented,” she says.
